name: ShadowsEscrow
description: A contract to hold escrowed DOWS and free them at given schedules.

functionDecorators.name: purgeAccount
functionDecorators.description: Destroy the vesting information associated with an account.

functionDecorators.name: nominateNewOwner
functionDecorators.description: Nominate a new owner of this contract. Only the current owner may nominate a new owner.

functionDecorators.name: getNextVestingIndex
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the index of the next schedule entry that will vest for a given user.

functionDecorators.name: appendVestingEntry
functionDecorators.description: Add a new vesting entry at a given time and quantity to an account's schedule. A call to this should be accompanied by either enough balance already available in this contract, or a corresponding call to shadows.endow(), to ensure that when the funds are withdrawn, there is enough balance, as well as correctly calculating the fees. This may only be called by the owner during the contract's setup period. Note; although this function could technically be used to produce unbounded arrays, it's only in the foundation's command to add to these lists.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The account to append a new vesting entry to.

parameterDecorators.name: time
parameterDecorators.description: The absolute unix timestamp after which the vested quantity may be withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: quantity
parameterDecorators.description: The quantity of DOWS that will vest.

functionDecorators.name: numVestingEntries
functionDecorators.description: The number of vesting dates in an account's schedule.

functionDecorators.name: getNextVestingEntry
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the next schedule entry that will vest for a given user.

functionDecorators.name: vest
functionDecorators.description: Allow a user to withdraw any DOWS in their schedule that have vested.

functionDecorators.name: getNextVestingTime
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the time at which the next schedule entry will vest for a given user.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: A simple alias to totalVestedAccountBalance: provides ERC20 balance integration.

functionDecorators.name: acceptOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Accept the nomination to be owner.

functionDecorators.name: getNextVestingQuantity
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the quantity which the next schedule entry will vest for a given user.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingTime
functionDecorators.description: Get the time at which a given schedule entry will vest.

functionDecorators.name: addVestingSchedule
functionDecorators.description: Construct a vesting schedule to release a quantities of DOWS over a series of intervals. Assumes that the quantities are nonzero and that the sequence of timestamps is strictly increasing. This may only be called by the owner during the contract's setup period.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawShadows
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws a quantity of DOWS back to the shadows contract. This may only be called by the owner during the contract's setup period.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingScheduleEntry
functionDecorators.description: Get a particular schedule entry for an account.

functionDecorators.name: getVestingQuantity
functionDecorators.description: Get the quantity of DOWS associated with a given schedule entry.
